info.author: Andy.Yang
info.description:
# How to install this module?

## First: install python3.7.4
1. go to https://www.python.org/downloads/ , downloads the version:3.7.4
2. double-click the python-3.7.4.exe to install according with the wizard. See the attention below first

Attention:
- check the option: add to PATH.
- suggest that the install-path is user, not global.
- others should check with the default

## Second: solve the problem with python2
Because our software depend on python2, so we must solve the compatibility
1. explore to your python install path: C:\Users\<user-name>\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37-32. 
Replace the <user-name> with your own.
2. copy and paste the python.exe to this directory, than modify the pasted file' name to python3.exe

## Verification: open a cmd to type the command below:
1. Command: python -V >>>>There should show Python 2.7.5
2. pip -V >>>>There should relate to python 2.7
3. python3 -V >>>>There should show Python 3.7.4
4. pip3 -V >>>>There should relate to python 3.7

If the step above show all right, continue. Otherwise, check the install.

## Install this module
- if you can connect to the internet, just follow instructions below. 
If your computer have python2 and python3, do: pip3 install featureview.
Ohterwise only python3 is installed, do: pip install featureview.
- if your computer can't link to the web, pls send a e-mail to me.

## Usage
- Go to your python install path: C:\Users\<user-name>\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\Scripts. 
- find the featureview*.exe, just double-click it.
- You can also create a shortcut of this.
info.name: featureview
info.html_description:
How to install this module?

First: install python3.7.4

  1. go to https://www.python.org/downloads/ , downloads the version:3.7.4
  2. double-click the python-3.7.4.exe to install according with the wizard. See the attention below first

Attention:

  • check the option: add to PATH.
  • suggest that the install-path is user, not global.
  • others should check with the default

Second: solve the problem with python2

Because our software depend on python2, so we must solve the compatibility

  1. explore to your python install path: C:\Users<user-name>\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37-32. Replace the <user-name> with your own.
  2. copy and paste the python.exe to this directory, than modify the pasted file' name to python3.exe

Verification: open a cmd to type the command below:

  1. Command: python -V >>>>There should show Python 2.7.5
  2. pip -V >>>>There should relate to python 2.7
  3. python3 -V >>>>There should show Python 3.7.4
  4. pip3 -V >>>>There should relate to python 3.7

If the step above show all right, continue. Otherwise, check the install.

Install this module

  • if you can connect to the internet, just follow instructions below. If your computer have python2 and python3, do: pip3 install featureview. Ohterwise only python3 is installed, do: pip install featureview.
  • if your computer can't link to the web, pls send a e-mail to me.

Usage

  • Go to your python install path: C:\Users<user-name>\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\Scripts.
  • find the featureview*.exe, just double-click it.
  • You can also create a shortcut of this.
